name: Stella Blue
description: Stella Blue is a 70% sativa strain from Humboldt County, California, that is said to be a cross between Blueberry and an unknown sativa. Testament to its Blueberry parentage is Stella Blue’s sweet, fruity aroma, enriched by notes of orange and berry. Stella Blue’s happy, giggly, and uplifting sensations take over immediately, and can easily be used for either functional focus or lazy relaxation.
descriptionPlain: Stella Blue is a 70% sativa strain from Humboldt County, California, that is said to be a cross between Blueberry and an unknown sativa. Testament to its Blueberry parentage is Stella Blue’s sweet, fruity aroma, enriched by notes of orange and berry. Stella Blue’s happy, giggly, and uplifting sensations take over immediately, and can easily be used for either functional focus or lazy relaxation.

highlightedReviews.text: This stuff is wonderful! Probably my favorite sativa. I'm prone to anxiety with strong sativas and tend to prefer hybrids, or else have to throw in a pinch of some indica to chill it out. Stella Blue is great by itself. It's a mellow, focused high that will perk you right up and make you want to do stuff. If you're not quite sure what to smoke and are worried the wrong choice will derail your plans, go with this one. You can be high as fuck and carry on a conversation with a sober person. Definitely a staple in our weed bar.
Nice sativa with happy but stoney feeling. Good berry flavor and smell

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Godzilla, Omega Dawg, Stella Blue, Punky Lion, and Swazi Gold
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Special thanks to all of our Leafly users who nominated these strains to be included in the Leafly database! First up is Godzilla, a crushingly heavy indica that will maul stress, anxiety, and physical ailments like a giant, bipedal Japanese lizard. Punky Lion is similarly powerful, containing only indica genetics for maximum sedation and relief. Omega Dawg is a lighter 50/50 hybrid strain that won't leave you feeling so destroyed, but rather in the blissful space between full-body relaxation and dreamy bliss. Stella Blue is a mostly sativa strain that lifts your mood into the clouds, and Swazi Gold is a landrace sativa that has traveled all the way from Africa to bless our bowls with its presence.
Remember to leave a review if you have the chance to enjoy one of these newcomers!
   1. Godzilla
Characteristics of Godzilla:

Mostly indica
Bred using God Bud genetics
Breeder: Caña de España
Sour berry and vanilla aroma
Brings heavy euphoria and sedation
May help with stress, anxiety, pain, and muscle spasms
Indoor flowering time of 55 days

   2. Omega Dawg
Characteristics of Omega Dawg:

50/50 hybrid
Cross between Chemdawg and Space Queen
Breeder: Alphakronik Genes
Skunky, diesel aroma
Delivers full-body relaxation coupled with invigorating cerebral euphoria
May help with pain, multiple sclerosis, and muscular dystrophy
Indoor flowering time of 65 to 75 days

   3. Stella Blue
Characteristics of Stella Blue:

70% sativa
Cross between Blueberry and an unknown sativa
Sweet berry and orange aroma
Has happy, giggly, and uplifting effects

   4. Punky Lion
Characteristics of Punky Lion:

Pure indica strain
Cross between Chronic and Matanuska Tundra
Sweet, earthy cocoa aroma
Brings heavy sedating effects
Indoor flowering time of 8 weeks

   5. Swazi Gold
Characteristics of Swazi Gold:

Sativa landrace strain from Africa
Sweet citrus aroma
Indoor flowering time of 55 to 85 days
